name: Sketchy Wings - the Flappy Stickman
description:
A tribute to the smash hit app, from the creators of the #1 game Stickman Trampoline!

Help the Stickman fly through the gaps with his makeshift wings. Simply tap to keep flying, and make sure you don't run into a wall! Simple but challenging... this game will have you hooked for hours trying to beat your high score.
Features Game Center leaderboard so you can compete against your friends!

Download for free and enjoy this addicting game for all of the Stickman fans out there!
